T02D2896b:250a-0: @250a sbyin sreg gi dus su bstod pa ni //
T02D2896b:250a-1: h'um gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
T02D2896b:250a-3: gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams //
T02D2896b:250a-4: bdud dgra khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2896b:250a-7: h'um dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
T02D2896b:250a-8: thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D2896b:250a-9: ta kri ta bya ba'i khro rgyal gyis //
T02D2896b:250a-10: deng gi dgug bya 'dir khug cig / nam mkha' stong pa 'gugs byed na //
T02D2896b:250a-11: gzugs dang ldan pa smos ci dgos //
T02D2896b:250a-12: sems med ri bo'ang 'gugs byed na //
T02D2896b:250a-13: sems dang ldan pa smos ci dgos //
T02D2896b:250a-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' dang ni//
T02D2896b:250b-0: @250b rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2896b:250b-1: bar du gcod pa'i bgegs chen rnams //
T02D2896b:250b-2: ched dang don du 'dir khug cig / rnam thos sras klu brgya dang bcas pa bgugs na //
T02D2896b:250b-3: aom bee shra ba n'a ya a'a k'arsha ya h'um dza:/
